Text:
Am loving these Flac uploads! I used to download MP3 then covert them to play in a CD player but after trying Flac to burn onto a CD I wouldn't go back now!

Looking forward to listening to a bit of Jean Michel Jarre now in the car and am betting it will be awesome!

Thank you again!!

I like mp3 for new albums ("try before you buy") but if you are making a cd then you better use flac... imho a cd from mp3 is wasted... 

you're welcome   :)
